dialogue.text: Listen, guys... I wish I had more opponents for you two, but I'm all fresh out!
At this point, there’s barely anyone you guys HAVEN’T fought yet.
Y’know what? Why don't you guys visit those schoolgirls again? You haven't been to their club in a while.
Skee dep.
You’ve been chilling with them outside of their game?
Right… I forgot you gave them their good ending.
Ooh! What about those ninjas? You liked the ninjas, right?
*blank stare*
...yeah, I know they're still busy…
Sorry, guys, I don’t know what to tell you. There just hasn’t been that many new people on my radar lately. Everyone I know has been real busy.
Boop dee?
...those guys?
They’re… from someplace special. I don’t know how to explain it, but their world isn’t built like the others I’ve helped take you guys to.
I only let people in if they have special permission, otherwise things might get really out of whack… and you two are real good at throwing other universes for a big loop, no offence.
*curious look*
I can tell you two really wanna see what it’s all about, but I can’t let that place get all weird. It’s... very important to me.
What if you guys, like… turn everyone scary and evil or something?
Bep.
Look, it’s happened to you two more than enough for it to be a concern, okay?!
*stare*
*the return of the intense unbreaking eye contact*
Rrrghhh, fine, fine! Ok, listen!
If you wanna go there, you gotta blend in, ok? That should hopefully prevent anything weird from happening. I’ll throw something together for you two real quick.
…and there! Okay, now listen up, you two. While you’re in this world, you’re no longer Boyfriend and Girlfriend, capiche?
[Back inside the world of Flavor Rave…]
Aha! Just in time, it's my favorite patrons! I appreciate you two arriving on such short notice!
It’s been a while, Showman. I ain’t saying no to performing back here again, especially with Sweet!
Good evening, Mr. Showman. I’m honored to be invited back!
But of course! Well, it’s a bit of a special circumstance tonight. My most recent applicants have insisted that you join them for a performance tonight!

I don’t usually spend this much on accommodation, but they were a rather persuasive bunch, and if tonight’s show carries the same energy as your last performance here, then it’ll surely be a spectacle!
Forreal? That’s crazy, actually.
Who requested us? Is it someone we know?
They haven’t told me where they’re from, but they’ve got spunk just like you two! They also happen to be a romantic duo as well. Allow me to introduce…
Funky and Saucy!
Yeah! What’s good, dudes? I'm Funky, and my girl here is Saucy!
Pfft, these names are so stupid… I love ‘em.
It's nice to meet you! How do you do, you two?
Sup! Y'all from around here? Don't think I've heard of you two before.
Oh, we're not from here. Our home city is... somewhere else, heh.
We're feelin' REAL good. You guys were just the kind of people we wanted to meet.
You ready to start singin'?
Ready? Like, right now? Don’t the show start tonight?
Yeah… waiting isn’t our thing. Nothing’s stopping us from getting a little bit of action before.
Getting right into it, eh? Hell yeah, you’re speaking my language!
This is our first time performing together, so a nice pre-show warmup would be lovely!
I’m vibin' heavy with this world already. Plus, this place makes us look hot as shit, not gonna lie.
Ahaha, babe~ You’re so right, though.
This speaker that the helmet girl gave me is way too small to sit my ass down on, so I'll get up and groove with you this time 'round, baby.
We're ready when you are!
Hell funkin' yeah!
Hmm… they’re blending in a lot better than I thought. They even get to talk properly in this world, too…
Man, now I’m a little jealous. I want in on this!
